body:
Hi Taizo,



Window7.4 can infact make XML files with multiple layers that can include films, air gaps etc. Two quick resources that I can point out to you in this regard are Section 3.2.1 of Andy Mcneil's [Three Phase Tutorial](https://www.radiance-online.org/learning/tutorials/Tutorial-ThreePhaseMethod.pdf) and [Greg Ward's presentation on BSDFs](https://www.radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2011-berkeley-ca/presentations/day2/GW5_BSDFFirstClass.pdf).

How are the properties of your window film defined? Can they be defined in terms of the standard Radiance primitives like [glass](http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/refer/ray.html#Glass), [trans](http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/refer/ray.html#Trans) etc.?



Sarith
